name: GroovyCatcher: Epilepsy Warning
description:
A game about music and suffering. Mostly suffering.

You must change arrows' colors to match projectiles that are flying in certain rhytm.

10 stages, 2 difficulty levels, multigenre original sountrack, plot twists and much more! (not really)

Very fun game! (no, it's not)

Reccomended specs are:

Processor: Intel Core I5 2.3 GHz or higher/AMD Athlon X4 840 Quad Core processor or higher;

Video card: NVidia GeForce GT 720 or higher;

OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10;

Disc space: 250 mb.

Computer below these requirements may cause gameplay to desynchronize with music.

Soundtrack:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLiIMurWvQ0g5jTx4NFKFNklE6oe5tTDX2

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1I2tJwPqKEq5YT1EBMQIjE7dLyXCOE826
